Chicken: Have you or your squad leave a moon less than a minute after the ship lands
Museum%: Have every single type of Scrap in your ship at the same time
Zero Fear: Kill every single killable entity in a single run
Zeus: Have you or your squad kill any enemy using the power of lightning
Giant Explosion: Kill a Giant using an Easter Egg explosion
Hug Escapist: Kill a Bracken with a Shovel
Slime Party: Have a dance party with a Hygrodere
Staring Contest: Stare at a Ghost Girl for at least 6 seconds straight
Worth It: Bring the Apparatus back to ship while in Embrion
Friendly Fire: Have you or your squad get a Nutcracker to kill one of its kind
Two Birds, one Shell: Kill 2 enemies with a single Double-Barrel blast
I Can Fly: Fly at least 40 meters above your starting point without holding a jetpack or using a vehicle
Hunting Day: Kill at least 3 enemies using a Double-Barrel in a single day
Fat Money: Fill your inventory with Gold Bars
Overweight: Have a weight of over 250 pounds after picking up an item
Backstabber: Stab a Crewmate to death with a Knife
But-stabber: Give a Butler a taste of its own medicine
Overkill: Kill a Tulip Snake using a Double-Barrel at full force
Dog Plush??: Bring a Zed Dog back to the Ship
MinMaxing: Bring every single piece of scrap in Artifice back to the Ship
Jet Squad: Have at least 4 Jetpacks inside your ship at the same time
Overprepared: Have at least 30 Walkie-talkies in your ship at the same time
Lore Expert: Collect every single Sigurd Log in a single run
Enemy Master: Obtain every single Enemy terminal entry in a single run
Dessert: Kill an Enemy with the help of an Earth Leviathan
Kamikaze: Kill an Enemy by stepping on a Landmine
Interior Decorator: Have at least 4 ship decorations placed at the same time
Clutched: Succesfully leave the moon while 3 of your friends are dead
Challenger: Get a rank of A or higher in the Challenge moon
